page.title: 09MRS. ENGLAND'S DAY
page.content:
Mrs. England sleeps until 08.00. She does the housework after breakfast and finishes her chores around 11.00, and then goes shopping. At about noon she prepares lunch, and after lunch visits her friend, or goes out walking. She arrives back at 16.00 to prepare tea. She and her family finish tea at 18.00. Mrs. England may then do some gardening. She watches Television until about 23.00 and then goes to bed.
She has lived in Thorner for 13 years. Mrs. England enjoys living in Thorner, and is a member of the Historical Society in the village.
Mrs. England rarely leaves the village, except to occasionally shop in Leeds.
